properties.name: google.drive.service-account-key-path
properties.description: Absolute path to the Google Service Account key JSON file.

properties.name: google.drive.make-public
properties.description: Grant 'anyone with the link' read permission after upload.

properties.name: google.drive.board-folder-id
properties.description: Drive folder ID for general board images (lawleximg/board_ID).

properties.name: google.drive.chatting-folder-id
properties.description: Drive folder ID for chatting images (lawleximg/chatting_ID).

properties.name: google.drive.lawyer-profile-folder-id
properties.description: Drive folder ID for member profile images (lawleximg/lawyer_profile_ID).

properties.name: google.drive.newsboard-folder-id
properties.description: Drive folder ID for news board images (lawleximg/newsboard_ID).
